DOC.brief_summary: To the safety and efficacy of a Bausch & Lomb Multipurpose Solution when compared to Ciba vision Aquify Multipurpose solution
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of a Bausch & Lomb Multipurpose Solution When Compared to Ciba Vision Aquify Multipurpose Solution
DOC.criteria: subject is a habitual wearer of a silicone hydrogel or group IV contact lens VA correctable to 0.3 LogMar or better (driving vision) Clear central cornea Subject uses a lens care system on a regular basis Systemic disease affecting ocular health Using systemic or topical medications wear monovision, multifocal or toric contact lenses Any grade 2 or greater slit lamp findings
